dct_title_s: Colorado (Clear Creek County), Silver Plume special map
dct_alternative_sm: (Clear Creek County) Silver Plume special map
dct_description_sm: U.S. Geological Survey; E.M. Douglas, Geographer; Frank Tweedy, in charge of section; topography by Pearson Chapman; triangulation by Frank Tweedy.
"Surveyed in 1904. Edition of May 1906. Approximate mean declination 1904. Engraved Feb. 1906 by U.S.G.S."
